name: 12 Hours to Witching Hour
description:
You play as an apprentice witch, who is taking part in her first Hallows Eve ritual.

Put on your platforming shoes and get ready for a puzzle platformer, that doesn't have any enemies... other than both light and dark. You'll see what this means.

The game is a submission for Godot Wild Jam #50

Controls

Move/Aim - Arrows

Jump - Z

Action - X

Reset - R
